projectDescription: 'A simple background I painted long time ago.' - Theoden on opengameart.org
Collection of various fonts, both pixel and vector based.
Onscreen controls for use in mobile games, there are 8 styles available and you can mix and match controls to create a style that perfectly fits your game.
This package includes over 480 tiles for urban landscapes. Including vehicles, road tiles, buildings and all sorts of details. Also includes 6 characters in four directions with walking animations.
